abstract: Things could be worse, and they're getting worse by the day.
snippet: Things could be worse, and they're getting worse by the day.
lead_paragraph: At this point Greece almost seems like a sideshow. Yet the scale of its coming default matters, especially with some players still denying that such a default is conceivable. So I would be remiss not to mention the awesomely depressing report of European Commission economists, which is marked "strictly confidential" but has, of course, gone viral.
